name: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale

production.name: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG

tagline: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

name: Dangerous Beauty
tagline: A Venetian courtesan becomes a hero to her city, but later becomes the target of an inquisition by the Church for witchcraft.

name: Swingers
tagline: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

name: Kickin' It Old Skool
tagline: A young breakdancer hits his head during a talent show and slips into a coma for twenty years. Waking up in 2006, he looks to revive his and his team's career with the help of his girlfriend and his parents.

name: Road to Rio
tagline: Two inept vaudevillians stow away on a Brazilian-bound ocean liner and foil a plot by a sinister hypnotist to marry off her niece to a greedy fortune hunter.

name: The Conqueror
tagline: Mongol chief Temujin battles against Tartar armies and for the love of the Tartar princess Bortai. Temujin becomes the emperor Genghis Khan.

name: An American in Paris
tagline: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. However, things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

name: Flawless
tagline: An ultraconservative police officer suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons - with the drag queen next door.

name: Bob Roberts
tagline: A right-wing folksinger becomes a corrupt politician and runs a crooked election campaign. Only one independent muck-raking reporter is trying to stop him.

name: Mindhunters
tagline: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

name: Talk to Me
tagline: The story of Washington D.C. radio personality Ralph "Petey" Greene, an ex-con who became a popular talk show host and community activist in the 1960s.

name: Anonymous
tagline: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeare's plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

name: Lantana
tagline: The relationships of four couples unravel after the discovery of a young woman's body in Lantana bush in suburban Sydney.

name: Italian for Beginners
tagline: Several lonely hearts in a semi-provincial suburb of a town in Denmark use a beginner's course in Italian as the platform to meet the romance of their lives.

name: Tortilla Soup
tagline: A Mexican-American master chef and father to three daughters has lost his taste for food but not for life.

name: Persepolis
tagline: Poignant coming-of-age story of a precocious and outspoken young Iranian girl that begins during the Islamic Revolution.

name: Bright Star
tagline: The three-year romance between 19th-century poet John Keats and Fanny Brawne near the end of his life.

name: The Company Men
tagline: The story centers on a year in the life of three men trying to survive a round of corporate downsizing at a major company - and how that affects them, their families, and their communities.

name: 2 Days in Paris
tagline: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.

name: The Way
tagline: A father heads overseas to recover the body of his estranged son who died while traveling the "El camino de Santiago," and decides to take the pilgrimage himself.

name: Welcome to the Dollhouse
tagline: Insightful look at an unattractive 7th grader as she struggles to cope with un-attentive parents, snobbish classmates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister, and her own insecurities.

name: Food, Inc.
tagline: An unflattering look inside America's corporate controlled food industry.

name: Hamlet
tagline: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

name: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
tagline: In the future, a man struggles to keep his lunar nightclub out of the hands of the mafia.

name: Run
tagline: When a law student accidentally kills the son of a mob boss in a fight, he finds himself relentlessly pursued by the mob and the police.

name: Black Book
tagline: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

name: Simply Irresistible
tagline: A magical crab works wonders for a terrible chef's culinary skills, leading her towards the man of her dreams.

name: Pumpkinhead
tagline: A man conjures up a gigantic vengeance demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy the teenagers who accidentally killed his son.

name: For Me and My Gal
tagline: Two vaudeville performers fall in love, but find their relationship tested by the arrival of WWI.

name: The Dead
tagline: Gabriel Conroy and wife Greta attend a Christmas dinner with friends at the home of his spinster aunts, an evening which results in an epiphany for both of them.

name: Solitary Man
tagline: A car magnate watches his personal and professional life hit the skids because of his business and romantic indiscretions.

name: Wagons East
tagline: In the 1860's Wild West, when a ragged bunch of misfit settlers decide they cannot stand living in their current situation, they hire a grizzled cowboy to take them on a journey back to their hometowns east.

name: Spartan
tagline: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

name: On the Line
tagline: A shy advertising employee meets his dream girl on the El train, but doesn't remember to get her phone number, resulting in an all-out search for the mystery girl

name: A Star Is Born
tagline: A movie star helps a young singer/actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

name: PCU
tagline: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stay at the wildest house on campus in this classic tale of anti-political-correctness.

name: Marooned
tagline: Three American astronauts are stranded in space when their retros won't fire. Can they be rescued before their oxygen runs out?

name: Staying Together
tagline: The complacent life of three small town brothers is shattered when their father sells the family business from under them.

name: Bogus
tagline: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

name: The Tao of Steve
tagline: Underachieving, overweight kindergarten teacher Dex finds a woman who forces him to reexamine his Zen-like system of seduction.

name: Keeping Up with the Steins
tagline: A 13-year-old boy uses his upcoming bar mitzvah to reconcile the strained relationship between his father and grandfather.

name: Much Ado About Nothing
tagline: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance and a way with words.

name: Inside Job
tagline: Takes a closer look at what brought about the financial meltdown.

name: Meet the Deedles
tagline: Two surfers end up as Yellowstone park rangers and have to stop a former ranger who is out for revenge.

name: The Sweet Hereafter
tagline: This film documents the effects of a tragic bus accident on the population of a small town.

name: Four Rooms
tagline: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

name: Thief
tagline: Becoming closer to his dream of leading a normal life, a professional safecracker agrees to do a job for the mafia, who have other plans for him.

name: Listen to Me
tagline: A group of college debaters learn about the world, friendships, love, dreams and family in this warm, endearing drama.

name: Enigma
tagline: A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.

name: Catch a Fire
tagline: A drama about terrorism in Apartheid-era South Africa, revolving around a policeman and a young man who carries out solo attacks against the regime.

name: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
tagline: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from real noirs appear as scenes from various films are intercut.

name: Goal! The Dream Begins
tagline: Santiago Munez is a footballer in a regional club. He gets scouted and transferred to Newcastle United.

name: Glitter
tagline: A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.

name: Brainscan
tagline: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.

name: Van Wilder 2: The Rise of Taj
tagline: Taj Mahal Badalandabad leaves Coolidge College behind for the halls of Camford University in England, where he looks to continue his education, and teach an uptight student how to make the most out of her academic career.

name: Young Sherlock Holmes
tagline: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

name: Mr. Nanny
tagline: A former professional wrestler is hired to be the bodyguard/nanny for a couple of bratty kids whose inventor father is being stalked by a rival.

name: Jeff, Who Lives at Home
tagline: Dispatched from his basement room on an errand for his widowed mother, slacker Jeff might discover his destiny (finally) when he spends the day with his unhappily married brother as he tracks his possibly adulterous wife.

name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
tagline: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

name: Flash of Genius
tagline: Robert Kearns takes on the Detroit automakers who he claims stole his idea for the intermittent windshield wiper.

name: Left Behind
tagline: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

name: Greenberg
tagline: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.

name: Pinky
tagline: A light-skinned African American woman falls in love with a white doctor, though he is unaware of her true race.

name: Ultimate X: The Movie
tagline: Made-for-IMAX documentary about the athletes of ESPN's Summer X games, including skateboarders, BMX riders, motocrossers, and street lugers.

name: Sweet and Lowdown
tagline: In the 1930s, fictional jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute.

name: The Fog of War: Eleven Lessons from the Life of Robert S. McNamara
tagline: A film about the former US Secretary of Defense and the various difficult lessons he learned about the nature and conduct of modern war.

name: Detroit Rock City
tagline: A comedy about four teenagers in 1978 who try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

name: Lovely & Amazing
tagline: Self-esteem and insecurity are at the heart of this comedy about the relationship between a mother and her three confused daughters.

name: A Day Without a Mexican
tagline: When a mysterious fog surrounds the boundaries of California, there is a communication breakdown and all the Mexicans disappear, affecting the economy and the state stops working missing the Mexican workers and dwellers.

name: Goon
tagline: Labeled an outcast by his brainy family, a bouncer overcomes long odds to lead a team of under performing misfits to semi-pro hockey glory, beating the crap out of everything that stands in his way.

name: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
tagline: A young FBI agent disappears while investigating a murder miles from Twin Peaks that may be related to the future murder of Laura Palmer; the last week of the life of Laura Palmer is chronicled.

name: Mostly Martha
tagline: When a headstrong chef takes charge of her equally stubborn 8-year-old niece, the tensions between them mount... until an Italian sous-chef arrives to lighten the mood.

name: Dancer in the Dark
tagline: An east European girl goes to America with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

name: Good Hair
tagline: Chris Rock explores the wonders of African-American hairstyles.

name: Whipped
tagline: Three egotistical swingers, who think they're God's gift to women, end up having their friendships tested when all three of them pick up and start dating the same woman.
